label: AB_oP8_62_c_c-010
title: $\eta$-NiSi ($B_{d}$) Structure
comments:
(Toman, 1951) described this in the $Pbnm$ setting of space group \#62. We have used findsym to transform this to the standard $Pnma$ setting. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-005}{FeAs ($B14$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-001}{GeS ($B16$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-003}{FeB ($B27$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-004}{SnS ($B29$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-002}{MnP ($B31$)}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP8_62_c_c-010}{$\eta$-NiSi ($B_{d}$)} all share the same AFLOW label, AB\_oP8\_62\_c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
